title: Eador Masters Of The Broken World (Latest With Allied Forces DLC
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of "eador masters of the broken world". It includes the latest "Allied Forces" DLC. All bonus content included as well. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


--------------


Bonus content included for FREE with purchase:

- 58 Artworks 

- Soundtrack 

- 28 Avatars 

- 8 Wallpapers 

- 7 Design Sketches 

- 32 Unit Sketches 

- 8 Team Photos Manual


--------------


What's cool about it:

- A balanced fusion of grand strategy, turn-based tactics, and RPG elements;

- Boundless role playing opportunities coupled with a massive selection of stratagems and ways to wage war;

- An intriguing, non-linear story that unfolds in a living, breathing fantasy world.

Overview:

Eador is a universe made of countless shards of land drifting in the Great Nothing. Each of the shards is a little world unto itself, with geography and denizens of its own. The power over the shards is bitterly contested by Masters, the immortal beings mortals believe to be gods.

Take the role of the mighty Master and shape the destiny of Eador! It is in your power to deliver the world from ultimate destruction Ã¢â‚¬â€œ or to choke it with an iron fist of tyranny. Eador. Masters of the Broken World is a turn-based fantasy strategy game, where the decisions you make affect the world even deeper than the battles you win.

Compatibility notice: Intel Integrated Graphics devices are not supported.


-----------------


Allied DLC Info

What's cool about it:

- 14 brand new units for races of Eador.

- New skills and abilities for added units.

- Even greater tactical variety on the battlefield.

Overview:

Allied Forces adds 14 brand new units to Eador. Masters of the Broken World. Each of the seven races in Eador is now reinforced with two additional units which have their unique skills and abilities. Choose your allies wisely to get the most of your combat potential.
